sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Button, Form, CloseButton, Modal, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { listStudent } from "redux/selectors/studentSelector/studentSelector"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { createStudent } from "redux/studentSlice"; import { addFormStudent } from "redux/selectors/studentSelector/studentSelector"; import { addFormDataChange } from "redux/studentSlice"; function AddStudentModal({ isOpenAdd, hideOpenAdd, onSubmitAdd, notify }){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const studentList = useSelector(listStudent); const newID = studentList.length + 1; const moduleList = ["active", "inactive", "trial"] const [addFormData, setAddFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", dob: "", signupDate: "", phoneNum: "", familyContact: "", parentEmail: "", status: "", avatar: null, }) const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const fieldName = event.target.getAttribute("name"); const fieldValue = event.target.value; const newFormData = {...addFormData}; newFormData[fieldName] = fieldValue; setAddFormData(newFormData) } const handChange = (e) => { dispatch(formChange({ ...selectedForm, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) dispatch(errorsChange({ ...errorsForm, [e.target.name]: null })) } const handleSubmitAdd = () => { console.log(addFormData) dispatch(createStudent({data: addFormData, notify: notify})) } return ( <> ADD STUDENTS
Student ID: Fullname: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Birth Date: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Signup Date: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Family contact: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Parent email: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Phone number: handleAddFormChange(e)} /> Student status: handleAddFormChange(e)} > {moduleList.map((module , key ) => ( ))}

Courses Purchased

Term

); } export default AddStudentModal
